summary: A BBC adaptation of the Victorian "penny dreadful" tale of 18th century "demon barber" Sweeney Todd, of Fleet Street, who cuts the throats of unsuspecting clients in his London shop.
cast: Ray Winstone|Essie Davis|David Warner|Tom Hardy|David Bradley|Roger Frost|Anthony O'Donnell|David Foxxe|Ben Walker|Jessica Hooker|Paul Currier|Mircea Drimbareanu|Gabriel Spahiu|Vlad Radescu|Bogdan Cotlet|Alexandru Dragoi|Alan O'Silva|Rachel Ogilvy|Claudiu Trandafir|Zoltan Butuc|Radu Bânzaru|Ingo Gottwald|Bobby Leigh|Radu Andrei Micu
keywords: character name as title|serial murder|sweeney todd character|psychotronic film|18th century
title: Sweeney Todd
